alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 1:36AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, light freezing rain is possible. Total ice accumulations of a few hundredths of an inch possible. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 to 10 degrees above zero. * WHERE...Coffee, Dale and Geneva Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM early this morning to noon CST today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Light ice accumulations on elevated surfaces and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute across these areas. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
